mapper.select: SELECT tb.*, tb.basket_count AS prod_count, tsd.shop_name, IFNULL(ts.pic, tp.pic) AS pic, ts.price, ts.ori_price, tp.brief, ts.properties, ts.prod_name, ts.sku_name FROM tz_basket tb LEFT JOIN tz_shop_detail tsd ON tb.shop_id = tsd.shop_id LEFT JOIN tz_prod tp ON tb.prod_id = tp.prod_id LEFT JOIN tz_sku ts ON tb.sku_id = ts.sku_id WHERE tp.status = 1 AND ts.status = 1 AND tb.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tb.`basket_id` DESC
